select yy.user_mail,yy.user_name from(select pr.id,bw.num ,u.user_name ,pr.user_pro_role, (TO_DAYS(date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S'))-TO_DAYS(b.create_time)) AS val ,fo.user_mail from bug_manage b LEFT JOIN project_user pr on b.designated_id=pr.user_id and b.project_id=pr.project_id LEFT JOIN platform_user u on pr.user_id=u.user_id LEFT JOIN bug_warning bw on pr.user_pro_role=bw.role_id and pr.project_id=bw.project_id LEFT JOIN platform_user_info fo on u.user_id=fo.user_id where pr.project_id=#{projectId} and b.bug_status=1 and bw.role_id =#{roleId} and bw.num is not null)yy where yy.val>yy.num
